attributes.action: Review opening golf courses with controlled measures of social distancing
attributes.additional_details: If this is carried out responsibly I can see that this will be safer than even tour decisions to open public parks where the public can be not monitored and irresponsible.
attributes.background: Following the government's decision to open parks I cannot understand how this is safer than  opening golf courses where you can easily practice social distance

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that golf courses in England can re-open. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
